sentences.en: At the age of three. his mother died, leaving him an orphan.
sentences.cn: 他三岁那年母亲死了, 丢下他成了孤儿.

sentences.en: He was an orphan and lived with his uncle.
sentences.cn: 他是个孤儿，和他叔叔一起生活。

sentences.en: Her heart went out to the poor orphan child.
sentences.cn: 她从心里同情那可怜的孤儿.

sentences.en: Herself an orphan, she understood the situation.
sentences.cn: 她本身是个孤儿, 理解这情况.

sentences.en: I'm an orphan and pretty much grew up on my own.
sentences.cn: 我是个孤儿，差不多是靠自己长大的。

sentences.en: Mr. Kern adopted the orphan as his own son.
sentences.cn: 克恩先生将那孤儿收养为自己的儿子.

sentences.en: She lavished affection on the orphan.
sentences.cn: 她对那个孤儿倾注了无尽的爱.

sentences.en: The boy became an orphan at six.
sentences.cn: 那男孩六岁时成了孤儿.

sentences.en: The girl was brought up in an orphan home.
sentences.cn: 那女孩是在孤儿院养大的.

sentences.en: The judge permitted the Browns to adopt the homeless orphan.
sentences.cn: 这位法官允许布朗夫妇收养这个无家的孤儿.
这孤独的孤儿渴望得到爱抚.

sentences.en: The orphan floated from town to town.
sentences.cn: 那个孤儿在各个城市游荡.

sentences.en: The orphan had been reared in a convent by some good sisters.
sentences.cn: 这个孤儿在一所修道院里被几个好心的修女带大.

sentences.en: The orphan was consigned to her uncle's care.
sentences.cn: 那孤儿托给她叔父照料.

sentences.en: The war has left thousands of children as orphans.
sentences.cn: 这场战争使成千上万的孩子成为孤儿。

sentences.en: When his parents were killed in an accident, he became an orphan.
sentences.cn: 当他的父母在事故中丧生之后, 他便成了孤儿.

words.tran_cn: 孤儿；孤儿状态；孤儿的身份

trans.tran_en: a child whose parents are both dead
